behavior.name: delib_ws_p2_sm
behavior.author: David Conner
behavior.description: Behavior demonstrating p2 - travel, open door, go to table, pick object, transport, and place using embedded state machine and operator selection.

param.name: get_location
param.label: get_location
param.hint: Sets the location to get object from

param.name: put_location
param.label: put_location
param.hint: Sets the location to put the object
